News Archives

  • [01/2024] New paper Skill-Mix: A flexible and expandable family of evaluations for AI models was accepted by ICLR 2024!
  • [09/2023] New paper Fine-Tuning Language Models with Just Forward Passes was accepted by NeurIPS 2023 Oral!
  • [04/2023] New paper Task-Specific Skill Localization in Fine-tuned Language Models was accepted by ICML 2023!
  • [04/2023] New paper A Kernel-Based View of Language Model Fine-Tuning was accepted by ICML 2023!
  • [12/2020] Our work InstaHide: Instance-hiding Schemes for Private Distributed Learning is runner-up for Bell Labs Innovation prize!
  • [09/2019] Andrej Risteski & Yuanzhi Li --> CMU, Nadav Cohen --> Tel Aviv.. Congratulations!
  • [09/2017] Tengyu Ma --> Stanford, Yingyu Liang --> Madison. Congratulations!
